typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{odata.etag} as string,
		ItemInternalId as string,
		ID as integer,
		Title as string,
		DESCRIPCION as string,
		CLASIFICACION1 as ({odata.type} as string, Id as integer, Value as string),
		{CLASIFICACION1#Id} as integer,
		CLASIFICACION2 as ({odata.type} as string, Id as integer, Value as string),
		{CLASIFICACION2#Id} as integer,
		Modified as string,
		Created as string,
		Author as ({odata.type} as string, Claims as string, DisplayName as string, Email as string, Picture as string, Department as string, JobTitle as string),
		{Author#Claims} as string,
		Editor as ({odata.type} as string, Claims as string, DisplayName as string, Email as string, Picture as string, Department as string, JobTitle as string),
		{Editor#Claims} as string,
		Identifier as string,
		IsFolder as boolean,
		Thumbnail as (Large as string, Medium as string, Small as string),
		Link1 as string,
		Name as string,
		FilenameWithExtension as string,
		Path as string,
		FullPath as string,
		HasAttachments as boolean,
		VersionNumber as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source(output(
		idCuentas as integer,
		Clasificacion1 as string,
		Clasificacion2 as string,
		Numero as string,
		Nombre as string,
		{_FechaModificacion} as timestamp,
		{_FechaIngreso} as timestamp,
		{_Hash} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source2
source1 select(mapColumn(
		CUENTA = Title,
		DESCRIPCION,
		CLASIFICACION1 = CLASIFICACION1.Value,
		CLASIFICACION2 = CLASIFICACION2.Value
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Seleccionar1
Seleccionar1 derive(HashCuenta = sha2(256,CUENTA,DESCRIPCION,CLASIFICACION1,CLASIFICACION2)) ~> Columnaderivada1
Columnaderivada1, source2 exists(HashCuenta=={_Hash},
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Existe1
Existe1, source2 lookup(CUENTA == Numero,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> busqueda
busqueda derive(Inserted = iif(isNull({_FechaIngreso}),currentTimestamp(),{_FechaIngreso}),
		Updated = currentTimestamp()) ~> Columnaderivada2
Columnaderivada2 alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Modificarfila1
Modificarfila1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		idCuentas as integer,
		Clasificacion1 as string,
		Clasificacion2 as string,
		Numero as string,
		Nombre as string,
		{_FechaModificacion} as timestamp,
		{_FechaIngreso} as timestamp,
		{_Hash} as string
	),
	deletable:true,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['Numero'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		Clasificacion1 = Seleccionar1@CLASIFICACION1,
		Clasificacion2 = Seleccionar1@CLASIFICACION2,
		Numero,
		Nombre,
		{_FechaModificacion},
		{_FechaIngreso},
		{_Hash}
	)) ~> sink1
